channel.title: 718 Help Questions
channel.description:
Hey guys, just a quick list of problems I can't solve on my own... so hopefully someone will be kind enough to assist me.
1. Mid-way through coding Bandit Camp on my Rome-based project, I noticed that my Money Pouch and XP Counter stopped working. Not the functions themselves, but the buttons no longer bring up the pouch or the xp interface. I can't right-click withdraw any money from the pouch but I can deposit money into it. Also money is removed from it when buying things without gold being in my inventory.
2. There are no guides for making quests in 718. I assume it works something like the beginning tutorial of Rome in which the progress is documented by stages.. but im not good enough with java to do it myself yet. I need some help with this.
3. I have been looking for an updated NPC definitions dump, because the one I have is missing over 1000 NPCS, including Astea Frostweb and the Ice Queen which I have used as bosses on my server. I need their attack/death animations as well as Ice Demons.
4. I attempted to take pieces of code from other parts of the server to make item effects such as slayer helmet and spirit shield, but I failed horribly. How would I go about adding item effects like these?
5. As many of you know there is an ultra annoying bug with the Matrix bank and equipment viewer interfaces conflicting. Has a fix for this been found yet? I have searched for 3 days and have not found a single piece of information on this.
This is what i've gathered after 8 days of working on my project.
DISCLAIMER: I am not asking to be spoonfed information. I don't want 2 pages of code that I just need to copy and paste. I am asking for help, guidance, training wheels so to speak. I want to learn how to do these things so I can do them on my own in the future.
Thank you

item.title: 718 Help Questions
item.dc:creator: @Murk3d09 Murk3d09
item.description:
@Murk3d09 wrote:

Hey guys, just a quick list of problems I can’t solve on my own… so hopefully someone will be kind enough to assist me.

  1. Mid-way through coding Bandit Camp on my Rome-based project, I noticed that my Money Pouch and XP Counter stopped working. Not the functions themselves, but the buttons no longer bring up the pouch or the xp interface. I can’t right-click withdraw any money from the pouch but I can deposit money into it. Also money is removed from it when buying things without gold being in my inventory.

  2. There are no guides for making quests in 718. I assume it works something like the beginning tutorial of Rome in which the progress is documented by stages… but im not good enough with java to do it myself yet. I need some help with this.

  3. I have been looking for an updated NPC definitions dump, because the one I have is missing over 1000 NPCS, including Astea Frostweb and the Ice Queen which I have used as bosses on my server. I need their attack/death animations as well as Ice Demons.

  4. I attempted to take pieces of code from other parts of the server to make item effects such as slayer helmet and spirit shield, but I failed horribly. How would I go about adding item effects like these?

  5. As many of you know there is an ultra annoying bug with the Matrix bank and equipment viewer interfaces conflicting. Has a fix for this been found yet? I have searched for 3 days and have not found a single piece of information on this.

This is what i’ve gathered after 8 days of working on my project.

DISCLAIMER: I am not asking to be spoonfed information. I don’t want 2 pages of code that I just need to copy and paste. I am asking for help, guidance, training wheels so to speak. I want to learn how to do these things so I can do them on my own in the future.

Thank you
